MacBook-Pro-de-Felipe:~felipeforigo$ Hi, my name is Felipe Forigo do Carmo, however my friends used to call me Forigo or Fori, so feel free to call me as you want. ;D


I'm graduate in Information System at Isulpar - Instituto Superior do Litoral Paran√°, however nowdays I'm working as Port Coordinator in a maritime agency.


In order to improve my knowledge and proceed with my career migration to web development area, I've commenced on Explorer program at Rocketseat.
